articles.description: Scottish Rugby calls on the sport's governing body to publicly acknowledge that a game-defining mistake was made in the last seconds of Scotland's Six Nations loss to France.
articles.title: Scotland seek admission of error from World Rugby

articles.description: Leah Williamson returns to the England squad for the first time since last April for friendlies against Austria and Italy, after recovering from an anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injury.
articles.title: Williamson returns to Lionesses squad

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama posts a remarkable triple-double of 27 points, 14 rebounds and 10 blocks to lead San Antonio Spurs to a 122-99 win over Toronto Raptors.
articles.title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama makes 10 blocks in stunning triple-double as San Antonio Spurs beat Toronto Raptors

articles.description: England vice-captain Ollie Pope says there is "every chance" the tourists will field an extra seamer in the third Test against India in Rajkot.
articles.title: 'Every chance' of two seamers in third Test - Pope

articles.description: Manchester City face FC Copenhagen and 'the Swedish Messi' Roony Bardghji in the Champions League on Tuesday, and BBC Sport has charted his rise.
articles.title: The 'unique' teenager who 'will join great Premier League club'

articles.description: Ferrari say their new SF-24 Formula 1 car "must be a consistent front runner" when the new season starts at the Bahrain Grand Prix on 2 March.
articles.title: Ferrari say new SF-24 Formula 1 car 'must be a consistent front runner' from start of new season

articles.description: Watch the Kansas City Chiefs celebrate after beating the San Francisco 49ers 25-22 in overtime to win their third Super Bowl in five years.
articles.title: Watch Chiefs celebrate Super Bowl win over 49ers

articles.description: Chelsea manager Mauricio Pochettino hails Conor Gallagher as a "priceless" player to have after his two goals inspire the Blues to victory at Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Gallagher a priceless player to have - Pochettino

articles.description: The Taylor Swift effect is thought to be a contributing factor as 123.4 million tuned in on Sunday.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024 was most watched US TV broadcast since 1969 Moon landing

articles.description: Defending champion Robert Milkins is through to the third round of the Welsh Open with a 4-1 win over Allan Taylor.
articles.title: Welsh Open snooker: Defending champion Robert Milkins beats Allan Taylor in round two
